mapper.select: UPDATE product SET finish_time = to_date(#{time}, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI') WHERE post_num = #{post} AND finish_time IS NULL
UPDATE product SET get_time = to_date(#{time}, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI'), p_receive = '1' WHERE post_num = #{post} AND get_time IS NULL
UPDATE product SET p_return = '1' WHERE post_num = #{post} AND get_time IS NULL
